items: **Backend Optimization**: Implemented Pagination and Lazy Loading for high-traffic Reward APIs.
**Frontend Assets**: Integrated `@georstat/react-native-image-cache` and Video Preload mechanisms.
**Layout Stability**: Designed `SuspenseControl` with pre-loaded Safe Area spacers to achieve zero Layout Shift (CLS).
**Defensive Playback**: Multi-quality MP4 auto-probing fallback ensures 100% video source validity.

items.title: Async State Machine Logic Injection
items.symptom: Hardware scan Hooks need to integrate complex API verification and UI transitions within a shared structure.
items.solution: Independently injected async state machine logic into the shared `useNormalTag` structure, modularizing NDEF parsing and Promise verification chains.
items.result: Successfully transformed hardware scans into predictable business states for 1,000+ products.

items.title: Defensive Error Routing Strategy
items.symptom: Need to navigate users to specific guidance screens based on varied hardware/API errors.
items.solution: Owned the `onRedirectScanResult` implementation, using Switch-Case strategy for 'Inactive' or 'Mismatch' errors with delayed navigation.
items.result: Ensured clear and correct UI guidance in all boundary error cases.

items.title: UX Sequence & Side Effect Management
items.symptom: Synchronization required between animation transitions and notification dispatch (Email/Push).
items.solution: Established 'Logo to Video' transition sequences and core `createNotification` trigger logic to record business-level actions.
items.result: Achieved high-performance visual feedback while guaranteeing 100% notification delivery.

engineeringRigor.title: Engineering Rigor
engineeringRigor.description: Leading the maintenance of the Berify ecosystem's native build environment and resolving cross-platform SDK integration challenges.

items.title: Xcode Toolchain & Swift Module Compatibility
items.symptom: Stricter Swift Interface verification in Xcode 14.3/15 caused Cybavo Wallet (Binary SDK) build failures.
items.action: Automated `-no-verify-emitted-module-interface` flag injection via Podfile `post_install` and forced a unified Deployment Target (12.4).
items.result: Resolved build deadlocks in high-version Xcode environments, ensuring team-wide build stability.

codeSnippet.title: Podfile post_install Hack
codeSnippet.code:
installer.pods_project.targets.each do |target|
  target.build_configurations.each do |config|
    config.build_settings['IPHONEOS_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET'] = '12.4'
    config.build_settings['OTHER_SWIFT_FLAGS'] ||= ['$(inherited)', '-no-verify-emitted-module-interface']
  end
end

items.title: Android SDK Troubleshooting & Migration

items.result: Eliminated runtime crashes and improved the maintainability of the IDV module.
